月底荷包緊，菜價大跌的高麗菜、當季鮮甜的高麗菜，正適合天天上菜！本週就來告訴妳/你，高麗菜豐富多元的料理方式，讓妳/你怎麼吃都吃不膩！

師傅話齋☯️：命格決定命運

但其實...命格仲可以決定埋玩法✈️！

想知道寒命❄️ /熱命🔥嘅你今個冬天去邊玩好？

睇埋落去喇！😎

戀戀冬日，冬季京阪散策！

文化體驗、玩樂、打卡、美食、觀光

所有你想象到嘅旅遊體驗，京阪都可以滿足你！

冬日，與你相約首爾

邂逅初雪，盡享滑雪樂趣；

漫步南怡島，感受韓式浪漫；

冬日溫泉汗蒸，用溫暖驅趕嚴寒，

一次滿足你N個對冬日的幻想！

冬天梗係要去泰國海島chill 一chill 啦～

同陽光與海灘玩遊戲，

玩到攰仲可以做埋個SPA！

堅．泰識歎喇～
According to our travellers, these places are putting out some of the greatest pies in all the land!
送你一個好消息！在市集見到的日本職人手製耳環、台灣插畫師的文具小物、來自泰國的皮革包包，統統都在期間限定的「網上市集」找到！不要再錯過了，Yeah～👯
今次同各位分享冬天必勝穿搭技巧，仲有必備嘅時尚單品，例如手錶、潮鞋、衛衣、牛仔褸等！
小貼士：將產品置中、用素色背景、調教合適光暗，可以令產品更吸引買家！
法國時間11月23日，國際展覽局第164次全體大會投票，選舉日本大阪為2025年世界博覽會的舉辦城市。這是大阪自1970年以來第二次舉辦世博會，也是日本自2005年愛知世博會以來睽違20年的世博會。
此次世博會的會址定在大阪灣人工島「夢洲」，原本是大阪為了競選2008年奧運會的主辦權準備用來做選手村的用地，後來奧運會競選失敗，大阪市政府便計畫把這裡作為場地申辦世界博覽會。為了讓夢洲在世界博覽會之後也能創造經濟效益，大阪目前計畫將夢洲建造為綜合渡假中心，甚至提議在其中引進賭場。

正式命名：大阪・關西世界博覽會
主題：生命閃耀未來社會的設計（Design Future Society for Our Lives）
舉辦時間：2025年5月3日（週六）～11月3日（週一）共185天
舉辦地點：大阪 夢洲
預估訪客人數：約2,800萬人
距離2025年還有7年時間，在期待夢洲建設同時，如果您來大阪旅行，不妨來1970年大阪世博會場地的萬博紀念公園觀光看看喔！大阪世博是首次在亞洲國家舉辦的世博會，入場者達6422萬人次，僅次於2010年的上海世博，是世界博覽會史上第一次沒有虧損的世博會。
這裡可以感受日本庭園的和式之美，還能欣賞著名的藝術建築「太陽之塔」！而且太陽之塔自當年世界博覽會後睽違48年開放內部參觀，今年3月起可以透過官方網站進行預約！如果想要感受半個世紀前的科技與美學，千萬不要錯過喔！

區域：萬博紀念公園
地址：大阪府吹田市千里萬博公園1-1
交通資訊：大阪單軌電車「萬博紀念公園站」
包夫連登ID 好前
5 Tips for a Happier Work Day

quote.msg: 包夫連登ID 好前

replies.msg: Over the course of our career, about one third of our waking hours are spent at work. This is a sizable number, and one that is much more easily digested if the hours are spent doing something that makes us happy. Being happy at work might not always seem easy, but it is very possible.
ead our tips for a happier work life.
Read our tips for a happier work life.

1. Set three small daily goals
2. Avoid negativity
3. Make your workspace your own
4. Take ownership of your professional development
5. Be future oriented

quote.msg: 包夫連登ID 好前

replies.msg: Most organizations face two major concerns that can potentially cause huge challenges when they arise.

1. The Key Employee Problem
2. The Specialized Knowledge Problem (Reinventing the Wheel)

quote.msg: 包夫連登ID 好前

replies.msg: Any good business carries insurance to protect itself from catastrophic events. It therefore stands to reason that it should also insure against these two challenges by taking a few precautionary measures.

Eight Ways to Fund Your Startup
You have a great concept. You've developed your business plan. Everything is set, except for one thing: money.

There are several ways to fund a start-up that involve varying degrees of risk and effort. When choosing a path, it is important to know your options and evaluate which one is most suited to your needs and tolerance for risk.
You can tap your savings, ask friends or family, start a crowdfunding campaign, apply for a loan, and more.
Five Secrets of Great Leaders Who Get the Most Out of Meetings
All too often we hear complaints about meetings being misguided, unproductive, and a waste of time. For a good leader, this perception should raise a huge red flag.
Great leaders can make meetings effective by

1. Being Clear About the Meeting's Purpose
2. Make Sure Everyone Speaks the Same Language
3. Be Patient and Encouraging
4. Celebrate Differences
5. Buy the First Round
Five Reasons Why Great Companies Have Happy Workers

In order for a company to succeed it requires a workforce that is dedicated to the corporate vision. A workforce will innately be more effective and efficient when a company's leaders provide a positive environment and keep their workers happy.

1. Practice open communication and trust
2. Create a career path
3. Offer benefits that are above and beyond what's expected
4. Establish a conflict resolution tool
5. Celebrate success

Six Reasons Why Companies Lose Their Best Employees
sk the leaders of almost any successful organization and they'll tell you that their key employees are among their most valued assets.
Unfortunately, many of them will leave. All too often, the reasons for their departure are avoidable.

1. Lack of a clear vision
2. The performance review fallacy
3. Tailoring talent to tasks
4. Letting work infringe on personal time
5. Only giving negative feedback
6. Lies
Top 5 Leadership Traits That CEOs Seek

Effective leadership is one of the single most important drivers behind performance. Successful companies employ skilled leaders in every key position. CEOs know this and are in constant search of people who embody great leadership qualities and character.

1. Effective problem-solvers
2. Results-driven
3. Supportive of others
4. Encouraging of ideas
5. Champions of change

1. Capital and Cash Flow
2. Failure to Plan
3. Not Getting Expert Advice
4. Time Management
5. Resistance to Change

Strategic Planning for Bottom Line Results
Can a strategic plan truly yield bottom-line results? Or is it just a waste of time?
The answer to both questions can be yes. It's critical to plan for success. More importantly, there are steps to follow to make it happen.

Most businesses don't do any strategic planning. And, of the ones who do, most treat it as nothing more than an academic exercise. This is unfortunate. With some effort and a willingness to make hard decisions, it's possible to create more than just strategy.
It's possible to realize bottom-line results from a well-developed strategic plan that is then put into action and followed through.
